sections.title: Understanding Your Results

items.title: Low Risk (0-30)
items.description: Continue regular screening as recommended by your healthcare provider

items.title: Medium Risk (31-70)
items.description: Consider more frequent screening and lifestyle modifications

items.title: High Risk (71-100)
items.description: Consult with a healthcare provider immediately for further evaluation
